alert.note: Alert for Henry; Mercer; Rock Island; Warren (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 9:10PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Warren, eastern Mercer, south central Rock Island and western Henry Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 909 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sherrard to near North Henderson. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could break small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cambridge, Geneseo, Colona, Coal Valley, Orion, Viola, Woodhull, Alpha, Sherrard, Andover, North Henderson, Cable, New Windsor, Warner, Lynn Center, Dayton, Alexis, Osco, Henry County Fairgrounds, and Ophiem. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 8 and 21. Interstate 74 in Illinois between mile markers 9 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
